text:
Listing 20.10: Example of evaluating a univariate LSTM model for multi-step forecasting.
Running the example Ô¨Åts and evaluates the model, printing the overall RMSE across all
seven days, and the per-day RMSE for each lead time. We can see that in this case, the model
was skillful as compared to a naive forecast, achieving an overall RMSE of about 399 kilowatts,
less than 465 kilowatts achieved by a naive model.
